version_description:
- Improved document resolution at default magnification
- Fixed an issue where images could not be added using Bluetooth keyboard shortcuts
- Fixed an issue where a pop-up document was displayed when running the app again after closing the app
- Fixed an issue where certain screen areas were not displayed when running the app again after closing the app
- Other bug fixes and usability improvements

- Support three-finger popup resizing as a default feature (removed from lab feature)
- Support video tutorial
- Fixed an issue where the left margin of the document was lost in 1 page turning mode
- Fixed issues related to the iOS scribble function
- Fixed some issues related to undo/redo
- Fixed some issues related to restoring backup files
- Fixed some issues that caused forced shutdown
- Other bug fixes and stability improvements
